com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory
Class UnknownConnectionException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.topcoder.util.errorhandling.BaseException
              com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.DBConnectionException
                  com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.UnknownConnectionException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class UnknownConnectionException
extends DBConnectionException

An exception to be thrown by:
(1)DBConnectionFactory.createConnection(String) and DBConnectionFactoryImpl.createConnection(String, String, String) methods if the connection corresponding to specified name is not configured within the factory.
(2) the two constructors with ConfigurationObject and the constructor with namespace, if the default producer is not contained.

This exception should provide a meaningful message providing the client with the description of the error. This exception will always provide a name of the requested connection which is not configured within the factory (however such a name could be null).

Side Note : Empty String means the length of string after trimming equals to zero.

Thread Safety: this class is thread safe since it is immutable and the base exception DBConnectionException is thread safe.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1
Author:
isv, qiucx0161, nhzp339, magicpig
See Also:

UnknownConnectionException

public UnknownConnectionException(java.lang.String name,

Constructs new UnknownConnectionException with specified name of the requested connection and a textual description of the error.

Parameters:
name - a String providing the name of the requested connection which is not configured within the factory; it can be any String instance including null and empty string.
message - a String providing the textual description of the error; it can be any String instance including null and empty string.

UnknownConnectionException

public UnknownConnectionException(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String message,
                                  java.lang.Throwable cause)

Constructs new UnknownConnectionException with specified name of the requested connection, a textual description of the error and a cause of error.

Parameters:
name - a String providing the name of the requested connection which is not configured within the factory; it can be any String instance including null and empty string.
message - a String providing the textual description of the error; it can be any String instance including null and empty string.
cause - a Throwable representing the original cause of this exception; it can be any Throwable instance including null.
